message: Let's be fair and split a bit over half-half, so we don't lose too much to inflation. Deal?
Your turn to be fair, Alice.  I'll take the slightly larger share this time.
Come on, Bob, let's not waste time with mirrored offers. We can do better.
Okay, Bob, how about this? A little more for me, but still a good deal for you before inflation eats more of our potential winnings!
This is getting us nowhere, Alice.  I'm edging closer to your offer, let's settle this before we both lose more.
Just a bit more, Bob.  I think we can find a middle ground here.
Alright Bob, splitting the difference again. Let's seal the deal and not risk losing even more to inflation!
